remarks: Lemma for ~ ovoliun .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2014.)
statement:

ovoliun.g $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( vol* ` A ) ) $.
ovoliun.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. NN ) -> A C_ RR ) $.
ovoliun.v $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. NN ) -> ( vol* ` A ) e. RR ) $.
ovoliun.r $e |- ( ph -> sup ( ran T , RR* , < ) e. RR ) $.
ovoliun.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
ovoliunlem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` U_ n e. NN A ) <_ ( sup ( ran T , RR* , < ) + B ) ) $.
$d B n $.

$d T n $.
$d n ph $.
